Sentencas: Structural phase transition behavior between orthorhombic and tetragonal in Ln(2)Ni(1-x)Cu(x)O(4+) (Ln=Nd, Pr), which attracts interest as new cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells, has been investigated with thermal analysis under controlled oxygen partial pressures (P(O-2)).
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: For Nd2Ni1-xCuxO4+ with 0.0x0.1, temperature, enthalpy change (H) and change in excess oxygen content () at the phase transition decreased with increasing Cu content.
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: The phase transition temperature decreased with decreasing P(O-2), whereas little variation was observed in H and .
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: For Nd2Ni1-xCuxO4+ with x0.15, crystal structure was tetragonal and no phase transition was detected below 750 degrees C. For Pr2Ni1-xCuxO4+ with x=0.0 and 0.1, phase transition was observed by DSC, showing similar dependence of phase transition temperature and H on Cu content and P(O-2) with that of Nd2Ni1-xCuxO4+. was not detected in TG curve of Pr2Ni0.9Cu0.1O4+, which could be attributed to too small .
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: From Ellingham diagram prepared using temperature and P(O-2) at the phase transition, variation of standard enthalpy (H degrees) and standard entropy (S degrees) was evaluated.
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: It was revealed that variation of phase transition temperature by Cu content and difference of the phase transition temperature between Nd2Ni1-xCuxO4+ and Pr2Ni1-xCuxO4+ showed correspondence with variation of H degrees.
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: Excess oxygen content, , in Nd2Ni1-xCuxO4+, evaluated with reduction in TG apparatus, decreased with increasing Cu content.
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: It was suggested that some amount of was required for stabilization of orthorhombic phase and that low by Cu substitution stabilized the tetragonal structure of the specimens with x0.15.
Titulo: Thermal analysis of structural phase transition behavior of Ln2Ni1-xCuxO4+ (Ln=Nd, Pr) under various oxygen partial pressures
